channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water not flowing way - huge build up of leaves and dirt, 12th December
item.description:
Outside Byron house on the Gloucester Road there is a huge buildup of leaf debris which is stopping water flowing away to the drain and causing a huge puddle. If the puddle gets any bigger, it will start to encroach on the pavement outside this block of flats. The leaves need clearing urgently.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 254, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trolleys, 12th December
item.description:
I have reported shopping trolleys via the trolley wize app. But they did not collect those trolleys. It's the following shops: M&S, B&M and dulmhill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, St Peters Close, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime trees urgently need pollarding, 12th December
item.description:
Lime trees in Kensington Ave still need pollarding. Reported in Nov 2024. Were inspected in May 2025 and anwaiting the work to be done. Another bough has come crashing down narrowly missing a car and driver. Trees opposite 8/9/10/11 Kensington Ave are particularly bad. Please action before damage occurs. These trees are on the highway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Kensington Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: H&S risk- someone has put some fencing in posts only, risk of falling and injury to humans and animals. Fencing, feet and bolts been on the grass since work in car park weeks ago. item.description:

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 11th December

pot hole caused cyclist to go over handle bars -
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadwork signs blocking the pavement on Justica Way, just after the first speed bump., 11th December
item.description:
There is a large group of roadwork signs and materials left on the pavement just after the speed bump on Justica Way. They have been in the same place for around two to three weeks. The items are partially blocking the footpath, forcing wheelchair users and others with limited mobility to move into the road to get past, which creates an unsafe situation. Please could the materials be removed or relocated so that the pavement can be used safely again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Jasmin Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dog fouling, 11th December
item.description:
There is an almost daily dog fouling problem along this busy and narrow path. This is frequently used by children and parents from the local school who have to constantly avoid this disgusting hazard. Please do something about this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Back Lane, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
